EmailTemplate.subject: New eBook! Does Your Loyalty Integrate w/Your eCommerce?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: With nearly 10% of grocery sales now being online, do you feel comfortable putting your logo side by side with your competitors on a marketplace-style eCommerce solution? And with increasing inflation driving consumers to be tighter with their wallets, other eCommerce platforms make it all too simple for retailers to click from one logo to the next to see who has the cheapest prices. That’s a dangerous place to be. Especially if your sought-after loyalty program doesn’t integrate with your eCommerce solution.
